<title level="1" right="Rules">[Adventuring with Companions](/Rules.aspx?ID=1883)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 5</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Companions that have joined the PCs don't need to accompany them on every encounter. They can be held back in reserve to guard a campsite, left to perform downtime activities, serve as leaders in the kingdom, and so on. But at times, it may make sense for one or more companions to accompany the PCs on their adventures. If you allow this, you'll want to adjust encounters to account for the [increased number of characters in the party](/Rules.aspx?ID=500).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Adventuring with Companions
